title: Textile, 1920s–30s
medium:
Medium: wool and cotton
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary wefts
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 107 x 122 cm (42 1/8 x 48 1/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 74.9 x 59.7 cm (29 1/2 x 23 1/2 in.)
description: Small rural scenes in luxuriant leaves.  Dark colors, primarily greens.  Straight repeat.  Lengths would repeat as a straight repeat when sewn together.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920s–30s.
1920s–30s. Medium: wool and cotton
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary wefts. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-201.
